data.title: Kevin and Perry Go Large - Ed Bye [DVD]

data.text:
The first big screen outing for the teenage characters made popular on the TV show 'Harry Enfield and Chums'.

When Kevin (Harry Enfield) is given a reward for helping to foil a bank robbery, he decides to use the money to fund a holiday in Ibiza for himself and his friend Perry (Kathy Burke). They hope the holiday will be their chance to both loose their virginity and make a mark as world-class DJs, but when they arrive on the island and suffer humiliation at the hands of their DJ hero Eye Ball Paul, it becomes clear that things aren't going to go smoothly for this unlikely duo.
